name: Frank McGUIRE, Appellant, v. SCHNEIDER, INC.

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and STOUT, JJ.
parties: Frank McGUIRE, Appellant, v. SCHNEIDER, INC.

casebody.head_matter:
548 A.2d 1223
Frank McGUIRE, Appellant, v. SCHNEIDER, INC.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 27, 1988.
Decided Oct. 20, 1988.
Geoffrey P. Wozman, Martin E. Goldhaber, Mary C. Fairley, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Samuel Y. Stroh, Pittsburgh, Raymond H. Bogaty, Grove City, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and STOUT, JJ.
